abilities.name: Mother Pheromone
abilities.effect: The attack cost of your Nidoran ♀, Nidorina, Nidoran ♂, Nidorino, and Nidoking's attack is Colorless less.

attacks.name: Give Aid
attacks.effect: If you have the same number of or less Benched Pokémon than your opponent, this attack's base damage is 50 instead of 90.
